summary: The test suite validates the functionality of the MediaConnect integration by using Moto to mock AWS services. It covers flow lifecycle operations—creation, description, deletion, start/stop—as well as management of outputs, sources, VPC interfaces, entitlements, and tags, and also checks the server component’s ability to list flows in a mocked environment.
business_intent: Guarantee that the MediaConnect client and server code correctly interact with AWS MediaConnect, providing confidence that flow management features work as expected and regressions are caught early.
